title: (x) Cup and Show Week logo serif face - ITC Garamond (modified) {Jan E}
content:
Hi there, does anyone know exactly what this logo type is?  
 I would think it has been modified.

thanks in advance, been looking about trying to solve it, going cross-eyed.

comments.content: I think it once was ITC Garamond.
thanks Jan, much appreciated. I think it was too or a mixture of a light Goudy???.. the the 'e' is well different
